4 This is a Quarto website.

text1

4.1 To learn more about Quarto websites visit

\(F=Ma\)

The .bst language is fairly flexible, but it’s meant to be programmed, except for simple changes, by reasonably experienced programmers. Patrick Daly’s custom-bib/makebst package, on the other hand, allows nonprogrammers, too, to create their own bibliography styles. (Patashnik 1984).

https://quarto.org/docs/websites.

References

Patashnik, Oren. 1984. “BIBTEX 101.” TUGboat 15: 269–73.
